usage.cn: 你是一道条件不完整的数学题，我永远也给不出正确的答案。
usage.eng: You are the one condition of incomplete mathematics problem, I will not give the correct answer.

usage.cn: ——如果别人伤害你，而你无动于衷的话，他们将永远不懂得尊重你。
usage.eng: If you don't correct people when they upset you, they will never learn how to treat you with respect.

usage.cn: 抚养孩子并不是改正他们的缺点，找出他们的错误，而是去识别和发展他们的长处。——《A Primer in Positive Psychology》.
usage.eng: Raising Children is not about correcting their weaknesses and fixing whatever is wrong with them. Rather, it is about identifying and nurturing their strengths.
